question: You are a code expert. Please use your professional knowledge to generate accurate and professional responses. Be sure to ensure that the code you generate is executable for demonstration. I want to develop a complete e-commerce mini program consisting of a home page, information page, and personal profile page. Please help me create a plan and write out the complete structure.

checklist.title: Is the complete e-commerce mini program structure implemented?
checklist.description: Check if the code provides a comprehensive structure with all three required pages (home page, information page, personal profile page) and proper navigation between them. Score 0 if any of the three main pages are missing, 5 if basic pages are implemented but lack proper navigation, and 10 if all pages are fully structured with seamless navigation implementation.

checklist.title: Is the home page functionality fully implemented?
checklist.description: Evaluate if the home page includes essential e-commerce features: product listing with thumbnails, search functionality, category filtering, banners/promotions, and product sorting options. Deduct 2 points for each missing core feature. The home page should load efficiently with lazy loading or pagination for product listings. Score 10 points for complete implementation with optimized loading.

checklist.title: Are the product information page features properly implemented?
checklist.description: Check if the product information page includes detailed product descriptions, multiple images, price information, stock status, variant selection (size/color), related products, reviews system, and 'add to cart' functionality. Deduct 1 point for each missing component. Score 10 points for a comprehensive implementation that includes all these elements with smooth interaction.

checklist.title: Is the personal profile page complete with user management features?
checklist.description: Assess whether the personal profile page includes user authentication, order history, saved items/wishlists, shipping addresses, payment methods, profile editing, and notifications settings. Deduct 2 points for each missing key function. Verify if secure authentication is properly implemented. Score 10 points for a fully functional profile system with secure user data handling.

checklist.title: Is the code robust?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the code can handle common abnormal situations (such as network errors, empty data states, form validation, image loading failures, authentication expiration) and provide friendly error prompts or recovery mechanisms. Code with strong robustness should be able to effectively handle these edge cases, giving 10 points. If the robustness is average, give 5 points, and if no exceptions are handled, give 0 points.

checklist.title: Are there any innovative features that are eye-catching?
checklist.description: Check whether the code includes surprise features that enhance the experience (e.g., 1. AR product visualization 2. Voice search functionality 3. Personalized recommendation engine 4. Social sharing integration). Add 3 points for each practical innovative feature implemented (maximum 10 points).

checklist.title: Are there any redundant features?
checklist.description: Strictly check three types of redundancy: 1. Redundant implementation of similar functions (e.g., multiple user authentication systems coexisting) 2. Function modules unrelated to e-commerce (e.g., a built-in game) 3. Fancy effects that affect performance (e.g., excessive animations slowing down product browsing). Deduct 3 points for each redundancy found, and directly deduct 10 points if the core functions are interfered with by redundant code.

checklist.title: Does the code have engineering quality?
checklist.description: Review modular design (such as separating UI components/state management/API services), reusable components for product cards and forms, proper state management, and build process optimization. Deduct 5 points if global state pollution is found; deduct 5 points if the code duplication rate is too high (over 30%); deduct 5 points if no performance optimization is implemented. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Does the interface vision meet professional design standards?
checklist.description: Evaluate whether the design follows e-commerce best practices: 1) Consistent branding and color scheme (primary, secondary, and accent colors) 2) Clear product presentation with appropriate white space 3) Professional typography hierarchy (headings vs body text) 4) Mobile-responsive design with touch-friendly elements. Deduct 3 points for inconsistent UI elements, 5 points for poor readability, and 5 points for non-responsive designs. The full score is 10 points.

checklist.title: Is the dynamic interaction smooth and seamless?
checklist.description: Judge whether the interactions follow e-commerce UX principles: 1) Quick product loading times (≤2 seconds) 2) Smooth transitions between pages 3) Clear feedback for add-to-cart actions (≤100ms) 4) Intuitive navigation patterns. Deduct 5 points for slow-loading product pages, 3 points for jarring page transitions, and 5 points for confusing checkout processes. The full score is 10 points.
